name: TENET (fan game)
description:
Tenet (Fan Game) is a top down time bending puzzle game.  You are The Protagonist and must get to the exit as quickly as possible.  But the path forward may be in the past.   

Much like how the critically acclaimed filmed deals with objects being able to move forward and backward in time this game deals with that mechanic.  You as the player can move forward and backward in time by using the turnstiles to solve puzzles and get to your goal.  

This game was made for the Mini Jam 63 game jam.  The theme was Future and the limitation was that we had to use the following color palette https://lospec.com/palette-list/arcade-standard-29
